Description copied from interface: GeneratorBase
Generates a graph from the specified parameters and rules.

Specified by:
generate in interface GeneratorBase
Parameters:
params - a String of parameters for the generation algorithm
areLoopsAllowed - a boolean indicating whether or not loops are to be allowed in the graph
areDirectedEdgesAllowed - a boolean indicating whether the graph is to be directed or undirected
areMultipleEdgesAllowed - a boolean indicating whether or not multi-edges are to be allowed in the graph
areCyclesAllowed - a boolean indicating whether or not cycles are to be allowed in the graph
Returns:
the newly generated Graph object
